features: PerfectFlow™ technology provides consistent performance, even in extreme conditions
PerfectHeat™technology for more efficient cooking with less fuel
Adjustable burner gives you precise temperature control
Powerful burner boils 1 L of warer in 3.3 min in a 3 m/sec. wind
Lasts up to 1 hour on high on one Coleman® 3250 220 g fuel cartridge (sold separately)
Serrated pan supports let you stir pots and pans without them slipping and fold away for storage
Generated fuel system minimizes flare-ups after lighting
Folding design to easily fit in your pack
Perfect for backpacking, emergencies and other outdoor occasions
Dimensions: 4.5 x 3.75 x 2.25 in. (11.4 x 9.5 x 5.7 cm)
